alert.note: Alert for Banner; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:46AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds will impact portions of eastern Scotts Bluff, west central Morrill and northeastern Banner Counties through 430 AM MDT... At 345 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 7 miles east of Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area, or 15 miles southeast of Scottsbluff, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsbluff, Gering, Bridgeport, Bayard, Terrytown, Minatare, Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area, Northport, Chimney Rock State Park, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Wildcat Hills Campground, Scottsbluff Airport, Redington, South Bayard Junction, Scotts Bluff National Monument, Melbeta and McGrew. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
